subject: Economics
title: The Nordic Model: Equality Without Sacrifice
description: A quick, practical guide to The Nordic Model: Equality Without Sacrifice.

hook.text: Denmark, Sweden, and Norway have the world's lowest inequality, highest happiness.

buildup.text: The Nordic model: high taxes, generous welfare states, strong unions, free education, universal healthcare.

discovery.text: Nordic countries rank among the top 10 globally for innovation, business competitiveness, and GDP per capita.

twist.text: The model works partly because of cultural homogeneity and trust.

climax.text: The Nordic model proves that equality and prosperity aren't opposites.

punchline.text: Turns out high taxes and happy citizens can coexist. The Nordics proved it.

quiz.question: What paradox does the Nordic model resolve?
